TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler(object sender, CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: 添付イベントを処理するメソッドを表します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 This delegate must be used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem> event handler.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingStackPanel.CleanUpVirtualizedItem> event is an attached event, but it has a direct routing strategy, which means it can only be handled on the object where it is raised.
## 例
